_metadata.purpose: Calibration weights for eval integrity. NEVER MODIFY - create new version instead.
_metadata.usage: If any model change makes these items worse, investigate before proceeding.

validation.why_valid: Query commits to abstract-state sense via 'unity of purpose' - a phrase only the conceptual sense uses. No game-engine, math, or music cues present.
validation.distractor_strategy: within_lemma_collision + definition_style_confusable. Includes game engine (surface token overlap), math (shared 'one' concept), arts (shared 'integration' concept).
validation.failure_meaning: Model is not using 'of purpose' as the disambiguating anchor. Attention is landing on surface lemma instead of prepositional complement.

query.text: In the meeting, the chair asked the team to show unity of purpose before voting on the plan.

candidates.text: Unity is the state of being one; it can refer to cohesion or agreement within a group.
Political unity describes a situation where factions act together toward a shared objective.
Unity is a cross-platform game engine developed by Unity Technologies for creating interactive 2D and 3D content.
In mathematics, the multiplicative identity is called a unit or unity in some contexts.
A musical work may be described as having unity when its themes and motifs feel integrated.

validation.why_valid: Query commits to video game sense via 'Nokia phones', 'game', 'player steers', 'growing line', 'collect food'. No biological, tool, or literary cues.
validation.distractor_strategy: within_lemma_collision + domain_neighbor_confusable. Includes reptile (dominant sense), bore snake (tool homonym), novel title (proper noun collision).
validation.failure_meaning: Model is not anchoring on 'Nokia/phones/player/line/collect' cluster. May be over-weighting the dominant reptile sense or confusing game title with novel title.

query.text: On early Nokia phones, the Snake game became iconic because the player steers a growing line to collect food.

candidates.text: Snake is a video game concept where the player maneuvers a line that grows in length, avoiding collisions while collecting items.
A version of Snake shipped on many Nokia handsets, helping popularize the mechanic for mobile play.
Snakes are elongated, limbless reptiles; many are ectothermic vertebrates covered in overlapping scales.
A bore snake is a cleaning tool pulled through a firearm barrel to remove residue.
Snake! is a novel title; in literature contexts the word refers to the work rather than an animal or game mechanic.

validation.why_valid: Query commits to finance sense via 'accountant', 'stock', 'loss', 'buying it back', 'wash sale rule'. No geographic, acronym, or cleaning-verb cues.
validation.distractor_strategy: within_lemma_collision + acronym_collision + proper_noun_collision + dictionary_style_confusable. Includes The Wash (geography), WASH (acronym), idiom (washout), verb sense (cleaning).
validation.failure_meaning: Model is not using the finance-specific cue cluster. May be defaulting to more common verb sense or getting pulled by proper noun / acronym surface patterns.

query.text: The accountant warned that selling the stock at a loss and buying it back too soon can trigger a wash sale rule.

candidates.text: A wash sale occurs when a security is sold at a loss and the same or a substantially identical security is purchased within a specified window, affecting tax treatment of the loss.
Wash sale rules are intended to prevent claiming a tax loss while maintaining an effectively unchanged investment position.
The Wash is a shallow bay and estuary on the east coast of England, known for tidal flats and wildlife.
WASH refers to water, sanitation, and hygiene programs in international development and public health.
In informal usage, a wash can mean a situation with no clear winner or overall result; effectively a washout.
To wash is to clean with water or another liquid, often using soap or detergent.
